summary: In this tongue-in-cheek sequel, the benevolent bog creature falls for the vegetarian, plant-loving daughter of the evil scientist who created him.

keywords: blonde|based on comic book|chainsaw|experiment|opening action scene
title: El regreso de la cosa del pantano
